description:
With the panty thief incident already eroding Class D`s trust, Horikita finds her leader key card stolen. While they try to figure out who did it, the base camp is thrown into chaos with a new incident of arson.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En général, ce que l’homme appelle destin n’est que le reflet de ses actes stupides.
Shikashi, Gaishite Hitobito ga Unmei to Yobu Mono wa, Taihan ga Jibun no Gukou ni Suginai.
Was aber die Leute gemeiniglich das Schicksal nennen, sind meistens nur ihre eigenen dummen Streiche.
What People Commonly Call Fate Is Mostly Their Own Stupidity.
ما يدعوه البشر بالقدر عموماً هو سذاجتهم في الأغلب
しかし, 概して人々が運命と呼ぶものは, 大半が自分の愚行にすぎない.
하지만 일반적으로 사람들이 운명이라 부르는 것은 태반이 자신의 어리석은 행동에 지나지 않는다
